ygData.subject: Day of Silence
ygData.msgSnippet: Me and Kinger have talked it over and we have decided that Sunday would be the best day for a Day of Silence in honor of Minime. I won t post anything on that

Me and Kinger have talked it over and we have decided that Sunday 
would be the best day for a Day of Silence in honor of Minime. I 
won't post anything on that day, and I don't think any of the others 
participating in this Day of Silence will either.

This isn't required, but its in respect to Minime. I think most of us 
will honor his memory.
